content: materials - 7 skeins of purl soho s lanecardate feltro 1 75% superfine wool 25% caregora angora each skein is 98 yards/ 100 grams approximately 650 yards required this is the color amur very light gray - us 13 9 mm needles gauge 8 stitches = 4 inches in fisherman s rib size 15 inches wide x 70 inches long 1 https //www purlsoho com/lanecardate-feltro
